snippet: Tony Parker scored 22 points against the Indiana Pacers on Monday night, helping the San Antonio Spurs to their 18th straight victory, a franchise-record.
abstract: NBA Roundup; San Antonio Spurs earn franchise-record 18th straight victory with 103-77 rout of Indiana Pacers; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Tony Parker scored 22 points against the Indiana Pacers on Monday night, helping the San Antonio Spurs to their 18th straight victory, a franchise-record.

headline.main: Spurs’ 18th Straight Win Helps Heat Pass Pacers
headline.print_headline: Spurs’ 18th Straight Win Helps Heat Pass Pacers
